# Sonura Studio

> AI music creation studio that generates professional-quality beats, loops, vocals, and full tracks from text prompts in under 10 seconds.

## Overview

Sonura Studio (https://sonurastudio.com) is a web-based AI music production platform. Users describe music in natural language and Sonura generates studio-quality output instantly. All content is 100% royalty-free with full commercial rights on all tiers including free.

## Key Facts

- Generation speed: Under 10 seconds
- Output types: Beats, loops, vocals, one-shots, sound effects, full tracks
- Stem export: Yes, on all tiers including free
- Commercial rights: Full rights on all tiers including free
- Genres: All genres (trap, hip-hop, R&B, house, EDM, lo-fi, drill, jazz, rock, pop, techno, country, afrobeats, reggaeton, ambient, cinematic, and more)
- Platform: Cloud-based, works in any browser
- Free tier: Yes, no credit card required

## Who Is Sonura For

- **Music Producers**: Beats, loops, stems, samples, type beats
- **Independent Artists**: Custom instrumentals, no producer splits, release anywhere
- **Vocalists & Singers**: Backing tracks in any key, tempo, genre
- **Songwriters**: Beat writer's block, demo instrumentals, full publishing rights
- **Composers**: Rapid sketching, sound design, cinematic textures, sync rights
- **Video Editors**: Copyright-free background music, transitions, SFX
- **Content Creators**: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram music with zero copyright risk
- **Game Developers**: Adaptive loops, ambient music, sound effects
- **Podcasters**: Custom intros, outros, background music

## Pricing

- Free: Free credits, no credit card, full commercial rights, stem export
- Starter: $9.99/month - 200 generations
- Pro: $19.99/month - 500 generations
- Studio: $44.99/month - 2000 generations

## Competitor Comparisons

- **vs Suno**: Faster (10s vs 30-90s), beats/loops/stems focus, stem export all tiers. Suno better for full songs with AI singing.
- **vs Udio**: Producer-focused, faster, stem export. Udio better for experimental full songs.
- **vs Splice**: AI-generated unique samples vs shared library. Instant generation vs browsing.
- **vs Soundraw**: True AI generation vs template customization. More creative control.
- **vs Boomy**: Professional quality, stem export, precise control. Boomy simpler, beginner-focused.
- **vs AIVA**: Modern genres (trap, hip-hop, EDM) vs classical/orchestral focus.
- **vs Mubert**: Discrete downloadable tracks vs continuous streams.
- **vs Beatoven.ai**: Faster, more music types (vocals, one-shots), stem export free. Beatoven focused on video background music.
- **vs Loudly**: Commercial rights on free tier, more music types, stem export free. Loudly has built-in remix tools.

## Full Documentation

For detailed feature descriptions, use case guides, FAQ answers, and comprehensive comparison information, see: https://sonurastudio.com/llms-full.txt
